snippet: Avezzano coached the kicking and kick-return units for Dallas teams that won Super Bowls in the 1992, 1993 and 1995 seasons.
abstract: Joe Avezzano, who helped the Dallas Cowboys win their last three Super Bowl titles as the colorful and acclaimed coach of their kicking and kick-return teams, dies at age 68.
lead_paragraph: Avezzano coached the kicking and kick-return units for Dallas teams that won Super Bowls in the 1992, 1993 and 1995 seasons.

headline.seo: Joe Avezzano, a Former Dallas Cowboys Assistant Coach, Dies at 68
headline.main: Joe Avezzano, a Cowboys Coach for 3 Titles, Dies at 68
headline.print_headline: Joe Avezzano, 68, a Cowboys Coach for 3 Titles
